definition: to pass on/to spread/to transmit/to infect/to transfer/to circulate/to conduct (electricity)

sentences.english: I submit that the jury has been influenced by the publicity in this case.
sentences.chinese: 我認爲陪審團在這個案件裏受到宣傳報道的影響。

sentences.english: Unsubscribe to newsletters or magazines that you don't read.
sentences.chinese: 退訂不讀的傳報或雜誌。

sentences.english: Then you look at the potential coverage in the media.
sentences.chinese: 然後再考慮可能的媒體宣傳報道。

sentences.english: And many other things exhorting, did he preach to the people.
sentences.chinese: 他還講了許多別的勸言，給百姓傳報喜訊。

sentences.english: No such early grooming has been reported for Kim Jong-un.
sentences.chinese: 而金正雲卻沒有這種早期宣傳報道。
